entry.title: Salted Caramel Cheesecake 8"
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Cake
Price: 1800.00

Celebrate with every bite of our creamy cheesecake with its crushed almond crust, drizzled with rich salted caramel, and topped with chocolate hazelnut balls filled with a surprise twist.

This cake is absolutely:

  • Sugar-free
  • Diabetic-friendly
  • Keto
  • Low Carb

Sugar-Free Salted Caramel Cheesecake 8"
Php 1,800 good for 10 servings
Best consumed immediately

**PLEASE NOTE THAT FULL PAYMENT IS REQUIRED BEFORE YOUR ORDER IS PROCESSED.**

DELIVERY INFO

For sugar-free cakes, we will deliver your orders straight to your doorstep from Sunday-Saturday between 1PM-5PM. Cut-off is every 5PM for Next-Day Delivery from Monday-Sunday.

Please expect a message from our rider when your order is about to be delivered. 

Multiple Address Delivery & Bulk Order

For 2 or more delivery addresses (with a minimum spend of PHP 1,500), send us an email at thesugarfreebakery@gmail.com to receive our multiple address form.

Special Delivery Requests

For special delivery requests outside of our regular delivery schedule for sugar-free cakes (Sunday-Saturday, 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM) kindly contact our Customer Care Team at  0949 786 5399 or thesugarfreebakery@gmail.com to arrange your shipping requests.

s:variant.title: Default Title

entry.title: Sugar-free Artisanal Chicken Pot Pie
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type:
Price: 250.00

If you enjoy a serving of Chicken Pot Pie, then we’re giving you another reason to celebrate.

Our Sugar-free Artisanal Chicken Pot Pie is handcrafted using fine, healthy ingredients to delight you with a meal made of chicken pie, croissant, and doughnut that’s sugar-free and diabetic-friendly. It’s the ultimate coming together of familiar, classic sweet and savory treats just like the familiar feeling of comfort you feel in your home - especially on Sundays!

**Each box contains 2 pcs. Sugar-free Artisanal Chicken Pot Pie**

This cake is absolutely:

  • Sugar-free
  • Diabetic-friendly

**Best consumed immediately**

DELIVERY INFO:

We deliver goods on Sunday-Saturday evening straight to your doorstep between 6PM-9PM. Cut-off is every 5PM for Next-Day Delivery from Monday-Sunday.

Please expect a message from our rider when your order is about to be delivered.

s:variant.title: Default Title

entry.title: Keto Revel-ution Bars
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Dessert
Price: 250.00

Join our sugar-free revolution with our new Keto Revel-ution Bars! A best-loved bakery favorite, and one of our most demanded treats; we did the impossible and made a keto-friendly, sugar-free revel bar that we think is even better than its sugary counterpart. Made from an all-nut batter and topped a thick river of real chocolate, this is one revolution that’s already won.

Keto Revel-ution Bars

Box of 4

Php 250

DELIVERY INFO:

We deliver goods on Sunday-Saturday evening straight to your doorstep between 6PM-9PM. Cut-off is every 5PM for Next-Day Delivery from Monday-Sunday.

Please expect a message from our rider when your order is about to be delivered. 

Shelf Life 7 days, refrigerated.
Storage Instructions
Store in airtight container, refrigerated.
Heating Instructions
Microwave 15 secs on medium high heat.

s:variant.title: Default Title

entry.title: Keto Vegetarian Pizza
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Savory
Price: 500.00

You craved it, so we baked it!

Delivered fresh to your door, never frozen! Imagine a grain-free crust made from mozzarella cheese, topped with shiitaki and oyster mushrooms, olives, jalapenos, and sun-dried tomatoes coming together in a meat-free, savoury, keto pizza that's flavor-heavy yet tummy light. 

  • 100% Keto Approved
  • Sugar-Free
  • Low Carb

DELIVERY INFO:

We deliver goods on Sunday-Saturday evening straight to your doorstep between 6PM-9PM. Cut-off is every 5PM for Next-Day Delivery from Monday-Sunday.

Please expect a message from our rider when your order is about to be delivered. 

HEATING INSTRUCTIONS:

Once received, kindly store your baked goods in the refrigerator overnight and enjoy!  For a bakery-fresh experience, reheat in your oven toaster or microwave on high for 15 seconds, and enjoy.

Vendor: Eat'sLifeManila
Type:
Price: 1750.00 - 2200.00 (2 variants)

One of our favorite comfort food, introducing our Gyudon with Crunchy Spinach Chips! Sweet and savory thinly sliced beef, gently poached eggs, then topped with fresh scallions, sesame seeds, and tōgarashi spice. All served on a bed of fluffy umami rice.

entry.title: Spicy Korean Salad
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eat'sLifeManila
Type:
Price: 1500.00 - 2300.00 (2 variants)

A hearty high protein meat salad for those days you want a more substantial salad. It's refreshing light, perfectly sweet & spicy, tangy, and outrageously flavorful.

Enjoy this salad on its own or as a meal compliment to almost any dish but we recommend you try it with Korean Hungover Soup. This refreshing salad is made of tender roasted beef, fresh lettuce, carrots, cucumber, french beans, honey, and gochujang for the perfect blend of sweet, spicy, and tangy.

Party trays to choose from: 

Good for 6-8 pax or 10-12 pax

1. Full payment must be made at least 24 hours before the delivery schedule. You may settle your payment via BPI/BDO Bank Transfer, GCash, or PayPal. For bank transfers, please send us a copy of your proof of payment to thesugarfreebakery@gmail.com

2. Strictly no refunds and cancellations.

3. Delivery address must be in Metro Manila. For delivery addresses outside Metro Manila, customer shall opt for pick up on checkout to proceed with their order.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Eat'sLifeManila
Type:
Price: 650.00 - 950.00 (2 variants)

Delicious, Soothing, Classic Roasted Pumpkin. Slices of fresh pumpkin are individually roasted to smokey sweetness, then blended with fresh cream, chicken stock, our vegetable medley, and our chef’s blend of herbs and spices to serve ladle-after-ladle of golden sunshine.

  • Sugar-Free
  • No Preservatives
  • Gluten-Free

Ingredients: Pumpkin, Celery, Cream, Chicken Stock, Bell Pepper, White Onion, Garlic & spices

entry.title: Giant Cinnamon Roll
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Sugar-Free Bakery
Type: Dessert
Price: 650.00

"Wow!" your guests and fill the air with the smell of warm cinnamon this holiday season. Share a slice or two of this soft fluffy dough filled with sugar-free cinnamon sugar & freshly crushed walnuts, topped with rich cream cheese frosting and sliced almonds.

Sugar-Free Giant Cinnamon Roll
Php 650 for 6 servings
1 pc Giant Cinnamon Roll
1 pc 50g Sugar-Free Cream Cheese Frosting

Best consumed immediately.

Shelf Life
Bread - 3 days at room temperature.
Frosting - 3 days refrigerated.
Storage Instructions
Bread & Frosting - Store in airtight container, refrigerated.
Heating Instructions
Bread - Microwave 15-30 secs on medium high heat.
Frosting - From the refrigerated storage, microwave container for 10-15 seconds at medium high heat.

 

DELIVERY INFO:

We deliver goods on Sunday-Saturday evening straight to your doorstep between 6PM-9PM. Cut-off is every 5PM for Next-Day Delivery from Monday-Sunday.

Please expect a message from our rider when your order is about to be delivered. 

Multiple Address Delivery & Bulk Order
For 2 or more delivery addresses (with a minimum spend of PHP 2,000), send us an email at thesugarfreebakery@gmail.com to receive our multiple address form.

Special Delivery Requests

For special delivery requests outside of our regular delivery schedule (Sunday-Saturday, 6:00 PM - 9:00 PM), additional fees may apply. Kindly send your inquiries at 0917 705 5876 or thesugarfreebakery@gmail.com.
